name: Samantha The Dreadful
description:
You play as Samantha Nickles, who wants to become a powerful witch to spite her god-awful parents.

Controls:
WASD = Move

Arrow keys = Fireball

Demons go right to left and will randomly go faster

Ghosts go left to right and will begin to move slower

Spiders randomly zig zag from the bottom to the top of the screen

Zombies are the slowest, but get faster everytime you move
